Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Px-cec2 (P. xylostella cecropin 2, natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (82.1% similarity)Px-cec1. Active against Gram+ S. aureus, B. cereus (MIC 3.5-5 uM), Gram- E. coli DH5alpha (MIC 0.5 uM), P. fluorescent, S. choleraesuis (MIC 1.9 and 2.5 uM), fungi M. anisopliae, B. cinerea, P. crustosum. P. litchi, C. gloeosporioiees Penz, C. orbicucar, and F. oxysporum (5-25 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Ouyang L, Xu X, Freed S, Gao Y, Yu J, Wang S, Ju W, Zhang Y, Jin F.2015
Literature Information.Title: Cecropins from Plutella xylostella and Their Interaction with Metarhizium anisopliae.
